documents.document: RT @jordan_law21: New blog post at Stem Legal: How to make your Twitter biography count: http://bit.ly/a10V56
Grateful for new followers -- I'll do my best to remain worthy.
Sad: just returned from Chicago from last in-person board mtg of Int'l Legal Mktg Assoc . Great city; terrific board. Proud of our wrk.
Congrats, Josh! RT @joshchandler: Have been added to the @Mama_To_4/cool-tweeps Twitter list (OK, this is just too nice, thanks Heather!)
Thanks, Colin! RT @colincameron: Client Relations: Creating Loyalty in Your Best Clients http://bit.ly/auQrKY by @lawyerPR
Grab the Oct Lexpert, flip to the back page and read Marzena's latest column. LOL thru the whole column!
For your bucket list: Maui's Four Seasons Hotel. Simply divine... particularly if you're ready to part with a lot of cash.
RT @matwilcox: Until I was 13, I thought my name was SHUT UP. - Joe Namath
RT @Riskin: Tonight I love Alaska Airlines and unlove Delta #Fail very much
Looking forward to seeing the LMA board and incoming board in Chicago soon! Such a fine group!
Saw @erinmconnell last night... looking so fine, optimistic & spreading good words for Wilcox staff. Interested employers better move fast.
Hey, Brit Petro! For the next junk shot: Plug the oil leak with Wall Street derivatives, Greek bonds... and BP shares. - P. Morgan
Sting concert still echoing in my head and my ears are still smiling. "Desert Rain" w/orchestral arrangement was quite simply magical.
So excited for my pal Val who just became a partner in her Vanc design studio. Woo-hoo!!
Vancouverites: must attend LMA "Leverage competitive intell" how-to seminar, May 27 -- http://bit.ly/aSZLdU
Beloved followers, please note: @susanvandyke now @lawyerPR
@matwilcox Did you cheer and holler en francais?
@kevwrites I'm still a card-carryng member of the page-turnng media consumer. I even < GASP > clip out articles & draw mustaches on faces
For parents desperate to keep up.... XYZ = EX-amine Your Zipper, according to my 8-yr old boy. He musta heard this a few times.
@cbcnewsbc Enjoying @cbcnewsbc tweets. Hardly need to read/watch news anymore!
RT @LawTimes: CL editor GCohen moderating LMA panel May 27 "Everything U need to know about the ACC Value Challenge" http://bit.ly/8ZEEd5
@unmarketing WOW. Shocking :) That's a different person!
@stevematthews Brilliant. Thanks, Steve!
Tired of getting spam comments on my blog via WordPress. Takes time to weed them out. Any suggestions?
@kevwrites Sporting a great new image! How DO you get your teeth so white?
@NatSlavin Hoping for a full recovery for your sister, Nat.
So happy with my web team -- creative, fast, professional, fair fees and oh so easy to work with. Can't wait to share latest launch w/U!
@OttawaLawyers COFFEE!
RT @DougJasinski: facebook privacy policy is now longer than US constitution. Check out the graphic: RT @wired: http://nyti.ms/ay3Uuy
Useful & easy site RT @LexisNexisCan: Need a lawyer? Find a lawyer and Canadian legal information on Canadian-Lawyers.ca http://ow.ly/1K2rx
@stuku Very cool. Good luck with that. I've also been integrating SM into my clients' plans -- so nice to be playing with new tools, huh?
@kevwrites ROFL ... while counting down the minutes until you responded. So not kidding!!
@DougJasinski (AKA Papa Skunk) Continues to be my twitter hero.
Lotsa new followers! Thanks for joining me, gang. I'll strive to be worthy.
Huh. Will that be fun? RT @DougJasinski: RT @bcbusiness: Dave Cobb named new president and CEO of BC Hydro: http://is.gd/c4SwE
Tx, Mr. Cape Twn! RT @siphojanuary: Kul RT @wileyccoyote TYVM, gang :) @palmerreuther @siphojanuary @susanvandyke @billybadbird ...
Tx, girl! RT @wileyccoyote: TYVM, gang! :) @palmerreuther @siphojanuary @susanvandyke @billybadbird @BethFrysztak @NewlineCreative...
Love this one RT @david_bilinsky: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." A. Einstein. #quotes
Ummm.. where did everybody go? Houston, we have a problem. #FAIL
TX! RT @gaillamarche: @wileyccoyote @susanvandyke @lalaland999 @m_margette @FTFortMyers @creative_girl @StateInsurance1 tx 4 RT's & fdback!
"Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm. " -- Sir Winston Churchill
"You can't have everything. Where would you put it? " -- Steven Wright
Canadian dollar crashing!
RT @gaillamarche: #LMA friends, if U know a legal secretary job in San Diego, let me know; former colleague now in So Cal looking for work
RT @DougJasinski: @jordan_law21 is now addressing LinkedIn for law firms over on Stem's LFWS blog (via @stevematthews): http://bit.ly/aXH5pT
Wisdom from a dentist: floss only the teeth you want to KEEP.
Feeling giddy ... Vancouver forecast is SUN for next 4 days. You'll hardly see a prettier city or happier people than on a sunny Van w'end.
People might forget what you said or did, but they won’t forget how you made them feel.
Always row together. You’re in this together, only to differing degrees. Some r partners, some not, but all working 4 clients.
With evry invoice u send a client, summarize your achievements & value. Dates, phone calls, e-mails, reports do not nec = value.
Watching Media Skills: lawyer as spokesperson (LexisNexis) video. After 18 yrs in corp comunications, kinda glad I'm not learning much.
Oh dear. Who's got the fire hose at Harper Grey? RT @cbcnewsbc: Kash Heed resigns again following revelations that ... http://bit.ly/cAKMXz
My former firm Harper Grey making front page news today re Kash Heed investigation
Palin... the gift that keeps on giving RT @matwilcox: Sarah Palin is so....well....watch for yourself. http://bit.ly/bG6i4v
Tx for the RT @NatSlavin: RT @susanvandyke: Client fdbck programs' value : ignore them and they will go away http://tinyurl.com/23n8c7p
@matwilcox Good one!
Client feedback programs' value summed up: ignore them and they will go away http://tinyurl.com/23n8c7p
Thanks @TaraCain!: RT @susanvandyke: Do you know any great lawyers who want to work for a *fabulous firm* in Maple Ridge/Pitt Meadows area?
Do you know any great lawyers who want to work for a *fabulous firm* in Maple Ridge/Pitt Meadows area?
@kevinaschenbren Happy belated birthday, Kev!
@matwilcox Hey, there's an echo on your twitter page.
@matwilcox Go on, what's your elevator pitch, Mat?
@matwilcox What's yours, Mat?
Current rant: who's the wise guy who started packaging spices in quantities that won't fit in a standard spice jar?
RT @kevwrites: Thanks to all who read my Klout piece on @natlawreview. It's a top 3 story for January! http://bit.ly/gjbXz9 #fb
Do I see light at the end of a very busy spell?
Book Hunger Games by Suzanne Collins was riveting. Forgot I was reading and was running for my life. Exhausted now.
@kevwrites GRRRRRrrrrr!
@kevwrites Spirit bears are OK only if toothless, de-clawed & recently fed. But you have to hold trademark - now owned by bc gov't. No joke!
@kevwrites Heather & I were asked to redraft their mktg rules & I only remember their concern about grizzly bears in mktg material ...
Heather & I were asked to redraft their mktg rules and I only remember discussing their concern about grizzly bears in mktg material ...
@Miss604 But then that would be like saying "pennies from heaven" and just doesn't sound right when referring to govt ;-)
Why don't law firm tweets ever state "we hammered the other side"?
Law Society of BC just informed me some of my published material will be used at PLTC (bar admission course). Feeling honoured.
Law Society of BC just informed me some of my published material will be at used at PLTC (bar admission course). Feeling honoured.
@aceismyname Tx, JR. Adore my LMA pals . Should I worry,tho? No Canadians on the 2011 inter'l board now. Who's gonna correct spelling ;-)
Just finishd my last inter'l legal mktg assoc board mtg. I'll chair my last committee call tmrw, then I'm done. I'll miss these colleagues.
Fun night last night with my LMA Van pals at winter social. My last official appearance as a board member...sad, happy, proud.
6th or 7th contact into 800flowers (aka @bloomex) for cust service. Brutal. Finally promised new flowers coming Monday. Will they arrive?
Trucks rolling now! RT @lawheadhunter: McQuarrie Hunter merges all offices to Surrey, now largest firm in Surrey. http://ow.ly/3nn2X
@BoughtonLaw OMG, Boughton: you've never looked better!
@rebeccawcheung Thanks! I wrote that article in 2008. There are probably 2 more dozen of mine on the CBA site. Love to hear from readers!
@TaraCain MEC?
Now on live chat with operator from @bloomex - 4th method... this is getting interesting. .. great ex of how NOT to treat your customers.
8 days and counting ... still no response from @bloomex. I've e-mailed, phoned and tweeted. What else to do?
@TaraCain Craig's List!!
Updated pic
So, umm, does City Hall need a building permit to do renovations?
OMG RT @cbcnewsbc: unconfirmed reports 2 construction workers killed on job sites in downtown Vancouver http://bit.ly/eC6deM #yvr
@cbcnewsbc Hey, here's an idea... what would happen if Carole James and Gordon Campbell ventured off together? Discuss.
@matwilcox Love that. Big shout out to Sam for his words of wisdom #taxiadvice
Client response to my comment? "Huh. And here I thought mktg was advtg and sponsorships." Evidently, there's still a lot of work to do...
Yesterday's comment 2 a client: mktg isn't only dazzling visuals + words, it's also closing gaps btw ur service, client needs + expectations
Lots of new followers over the past coupla weeks. Thanks for joining me!
@matwilcox I chat with cabbies all the time, too. Do you ever get the same driver?
Leonard Cohen concert from the box suite tonight... yeah , baby! Anyone else going?
Good 1 RT @david_bilinsky: "The best angle from which 2 approach any problem is the try-angle. " ~Unknown #quotes #humor #solosmall #bclaw
Start a legal blog! RT @CherylBame: Considering whether 2 blog? Check out Legal PR Advice on how to get started. http://bit.ly/eJ9TIf
Bravo! RT @BoughtonLaw: Boughton repeats tradition of sponsoring low-income families thru the YWCA’s Presents of... http://bit.ly/fYxgT7
@thelawyercoach and I presented a jam-packed TagLaw webinar for associates on critical steps for success. So fun to tag-team with Allison!
